hero.name: Adam Krupa // pcstyle
hero.description: 18 y/o developer from Poland, first-year AI student at Częstochowa University of Technology. Combining AI, creative code, and brutal aesthetics is my favorite chaos.

latestDrop.label: latest drop
latestDrop.descriptionSuffix: Newest build adds smarter typo heuristics, adjustable pause profiles, panic-stop shortcuts, and a CLI replay mode. Curious about red-team benchmarks or detector bypass notes? Ping me and I'll drop the raw notebooks.

projects.title: playground of subdomains
projects.subtitle: // here's what's happening: live experiments with clocks, aim training, calculators, and AI graphics

explorations.title: What I'm exploring now
explorations.subtitle: // quick lab notes — experiments I'm gluing together late at night

realtimeAI.title: Realtime AI workflows
realtimeAI.description: Building lightweight agents that turn prompts into ready animations and shader variations on the fly.

neoBrutalist.title: Neo-brutalist design system
neoBrutalist.description: Organizing contrasts, spacing, and brutal shadows in tokens so every subdomain has the same energy.
neoBrutalist.status: Tokens already sitting in Tailwind v4

sshContact.title: Interactive SSH contact UX
sshContact.description: Polishing smoother onboarding and live logs so leaving messages from the terminal is stress-free.

faq.title: Quick answers
faq.subtitle: Most common questions from clients and collaborators. Need more details? Reach out via email or book a call.

who.question: Who am I?
who.answer: Adam Krupa (pcstyle) — developer from Poland. I combine AI, design, and creative code. Studying Artificial Intelligence at Częstochowa University of Technology.

projects.question: What projects do I run?
projects.answer: TypeSim, Messenger Desktop, PixelForge, Clock Gallery, Cosmic Cinema, AimDrift, DreamCats, PoliCalc, Math Canvas, and BrosOS — spanning AI tools, desktop apps, creative experiments, and student utilities.

stack.question: What stack do I use?
stack.answer: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind v4, Framer Motion, WebGL shaders. On the AI side — Python and custom generative pipelines.

contact.question: How to contact me?
contact.answer: Email adamkrupa@tuta.io, catch me on Discord (@pcstyle), or try the SSH modal. For calls, I have a calendar at cal.com/pcstyle.

typesim.description: AI-powered Python tool simulating human typing (typos, pauses, edits) to bypass typing detectors.
typesim.tagline: Human typing simulator — typos, pauses, and edits on command

messenger-desktop.description: Unofficial desktop client for Facebook Messenger with privacy controls, theming, always-on-top, and UX polish.
messenger-desktop.tagline: Desktop Messenger client — privacy, theming, and polish

pixlab.description: AI-powered image editing studio: point-and-edit, style transfer, retouching, object removal.
pixlab.tagline: AI-powered graphics studio — professional-level photo editing

clock.description: Interactive gallery of animated clocks (doodle, mycelium, particle, neon, experimental).
clock.tagline: Interactive gallery of animated clocks — art in real time

cosmos.description: Procedural documentaries generated in real time using math and code (no video files).
cosmos.tagline: Real-time procedural documentaries — math meets cinema

driftfield.description: Precision aim trainer focusing on rhythm, flow, reflex and evolving visuals.
driftfield.tagline: Precision aim trainer — rhythm, accuracy, and reflexes in one

dreamcats.description: Real-time multiplayer card game inspired by Rat-a-Tat Cat with UI polish and state sync.
dreamcats.tagline: Multiplayer card game — real-time sync and polished UI

kalkulator.description: Grade calculators for Politechnika Częstochowska students (PP, ALG, PAM, more planned).
kalkulator.tagline: Grade calculator for CUT students — fast and precise

math.description: Interactive canvas for solving and visualizing math exercises.
math.tagline: Interactive math canvas — visualize and solve

os.tagline: Experimental OS in your browser — interface playground
